system.description: Those who are strong of heart and noble of spirit are dressed in armour surrounded by a halo of pure light: this grants an AC bonus equal to their Virtue above 14, and for a 21, one more point. It also increases all saving throws by +1 at 14 Virtue, +2 at 17 Virtue, and +3 at 21 Virtue. If the target is already wearing armour, the stronger value prevails, but they still receive the saving throw bonus.
